text: Custom objects desperately need an image select (or file select) property that brings up the filemanager slide-out picker. <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Add-image-select-property-type-for-objects/idi-p/596278|There’s an older idea we should upvote here>.
I’d even settle for a checkbox in the file property’s rules to allow users to bring up the file picker panel. Currently the file property/field only brings up a system upload alert/modal.
